downloadTitle: Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 White Paper: Posting Sales Tax Amounts for Intercompany Transactions
downloadDescription: When you post an intercompany transaction, you can select which legal entity to post sales tax amounts to – the destination legal entity or the source legal entity.

downloadFile.name: Posting sales tax amounts for intercompany transactions.pdf
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/7/3/8/7386078a-64ca-4558-8a53-14878ff64fd8/Posting sales tax amounts for intercompany transactions.pdf

detailsSection: In Microsoft Dynamics AX, you can create intercompany transactions, which are transactions between legal entities of the same organization. Those transactions are posted to general ledger accounts that are consolidated, or combined, into accounts for a single, consolidated legal entity.
detailsSection_file_name: Posting sales tax amounts for intercompany transactions.pdf
systemRequirementsSection:
• To view the PDF file, you will need a PDF reader, such as the free Adobe Reader.
  • For information about the system requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012, see System requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click Download to download the document in PDF file format.
  2. Save the file to your computer.
